document.full_text: oscar winning actor robert de niro told a packed manhattan courtroom on friday he had never received payment from an art gallery director on trial for allegedly pocketing the proceeds of three paintings by his late father, robert de niro sr.
document.title: robert de niro testifies in new york larceny trial
lines_and_colors: oscar winning actor robert de niro told a packed manhattan courtroom on friday he had never received payment from an art gallery director on trial for allegedly pocketing the proceeds of three paintings by his late father, robert de niro sr.
